Key.French: Niveau de carburant: %1 l (%2%3 de %4 l)

Key.Russian: Уровень заряда батареи: %1 Wh (%2%3 of %4 Wh)
Key.French: Niveau de batterie: %1 Wh (%2%3 de %4 Wh)

Key.Original: Power Level set at the beginning of the mission
Key.English: Power Level set at the beginning of the mission
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务开始时设定的功率等级
Key.Russian: Уровень мощности, установленный в начале миссии
Key.French: Niveau de puissance défini au début de la mission
Key.Italian: Livello potenza elettrica impostata all'inizio della missione

Key.Original: Is the device turned on at the beginning of the mission?
Key.English: Is the device turned on at the beginning of the mission?
Key.German: Ist das Gerät zum Beginn der Mission angeschaltet?
Key.Chinesesimp: Is the device turned on at the beginning of the mission?
Key.Russian: Is the device turned on at the beginning of the mission?
Key.French: Is the device turned on at the beginning of the mission?
Key.Italian: Is the device turned on at the beginning of the mission?

Key.Original: Fuel Level set at the beginning of the mission
Key.English: Fuel Level set at the beginning of the mission
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务开始时设定的燃料
Key.Russian: Уровень топлива установленный в начале миссии
Key.French: Niveau de carburant défini au début de la mission
Key.Italian: Livello carburante impostato all'inizio della missione

Key.Original: Forbidden connection removed: this source asset is not allowed for connection type: %1
Key.English: Forbidden connection removed: this source asset is not allowed for connection type: %1
Key.German: Unzulässige Verbindung entfernt: für dieses Ausgangsgerät sind Verbindungen diesen Typs unzulässig: %1
Key.Chinesesimp: 已移除非法连接: 此来源不适用于连接类型: %1
Key.Russian: Удалено недопустимое соединение: для этого устройства вывода соединения такого типа недопустимы: %1
Key.French: Connexion interdite supprimée : cet élément source n'est pas autorisé pour le type de connexion: %1
Key.Italian: Rimosse connessioni proibita:Questa fonte non è permessa per questo tipo di connessione: %1

Key.Original: Forbidden connection removed: this destination asset is not allowed for connection type: %1
Key.English: Forbidden connection removed: this destination asset is not allowed for connection type: %1
Key.German: Unzulässige Verbindung entfernt: für dieses Zielgerät sind Verbindungen diesen Typs unzulässig: %1
Key.Chinesesimp: 已移除非法连接: 此目标不适用于连接类型: %1
Key.Russian: Удалено запрещенное подключение: этот целевой ресурс не разрешен для типа подключения: %1
Key.French: Connexion interdite supprimée : cet élément de destination n'est pas autorisé pour le type de connexion: %1
Key.Italian: Rimossa connessione proibita: Questa destinazione non è permessa per questo tipo di connessione: %1

Key.Original: Forbidden connection removed: source and destination are identical
Key.English: Forbidden connection removed: source and destination are identical
Key.German: Unzulässige Verbindung entfernt: Ausgang und Ziel sind identisch
Key.Chinesesimp: 已移除非法连接: 来源和目标重复
Key.Russian: Удалено недопустимое соединение: выход и пункт назначения идентичны
Key.French: Connexion interdite supprimée : la source et la destination sont identiques
Key.Italian: Rimossa connessione proibita: fonte e destinazione sono identiche

Key.Original: Connection warning: this asset already has a connection of type: %1
Key.English: Connection warning: this asset already has a connection of type: %1
Key.German: Verbindungswarnung: dieses Gerät hat bereits eine Verbindung vom Typ: %1
Key.Chinesesimp: 连接警告: 此资产已有一个类型为 %1 的连接
Key.Russian: Предупреждение о подключении: у этого устройства уже есть подключение такого типа: %1
Key.French: Avertissement de connexion : cet actif a déjà une connexion de type: %1
Key.Italian: Avviso connessione: Questo asset hanno già una connessione del tipo: %1

Key.Original: By enabling the AE3 Debug Mode you will get additional information about the internal structure of AE3.
Key.English: By enabling the AE3 Debug Mode you will get additional information about the internal structure of AE3.
Key.German: Durch das Aktivieren des AE3 Debug Modus erhältst du zusätzliche Informationen über die interne Struktur von AE3.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你可以通过AE3调试模式获得更多有关AE3内部结构的信息.
Key.Russian: Включив режим отладки AE3, вы получите дополнительную информацию о внутренней структуре AE3.
Key.French: En activant le mode de débogage AE3, vous obtiendrez des informations supplémentaires sur la structure interne d'AE3.
Key.Italian: Abilitando la modalità DEBUG AE3 riceverai informazioni addizionali riguardo la struttura interna di AE3.
